rajawali.materials.textures

Class ASingleTexture

  • java.lang.Object
    • rajawali.renderer.AFrameTask
      • rajawali.materials.textures.ATexture
        • rajawali.materials.textures.ASingleTexture
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AlphaMapTexture, AnimatedGIFTexture, NormalMapTexture, SpecularMapTexture, SphereMapTexture, Texture

    public abstract class ASingleTexture
extends ATexture
    This class is used to specify texture options.
    Author:
    dennis.ippel
